# small e in RSA

## tools 

gmpy2 

to install gmpy2, cause it uses Cython, so needs some libraries
`sudo apt-get install  libgmp3-dev`
`sudo apt-get install libmpc-dev`

Crypto is not in library "Crypto", install using "pip3 install pycrypto"

RsaCtfTool

## small e

if m^e is less than n. the `mod` not even be used. So simply find "e"th root of m.

```
./RsaCtfTool.py -n  -e 5 --uncipher 
[+] Clear text : b'flag{y_cant_pyth0n_d0_nth_r00ts?_f6f790dd3c12}'
```
